name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: Sakura's My Nurse! / One Vote for Rock Lee!
short_description: Lee fakes being sick so that Sakura will be his nurse, only to find that his rival in love is using the same tactic. Later, Sasuke won the last popularity contest, while Lee wasn't even on the board!
